{{ardayearheader: * [[Fëanor]] finishes his creation of the [[Silmarils]].<ref name="Annals">{{AA

Year of the Trees 1400: Melkor]] covets the Silmarils and spreads lies amongst the [[Noldor]] that [[Fingolfin]] wishes to supplant [[Finwë]] and Fëanor. The Noldor start building armouries.<ref name="Annals"/>
